entry.title: Damn Vulnerable Router Firmware
entry.content:
As microprocessors become cheaper and cheaper it appears that everything that doesn’t need a processor is getting a processor. Unfortunately a lot of these devices are programmed with poor programming practices which is then sold off to the consumer. To help prevent this trend I decided to start the “Damn Vulnerable Router Firmware” project. This project is based of DD-WRT technology but has been re-written in a way to make it vulnerable. This project has been inspired by the Damn Vulnerable Web App project since I believe the hands on experience is a greater teaching tool than just reading up on it.

+To be released before 2016

Damn Vulnerable Router Firmware was originally published by b1ack0wl at b1ack0wl on December 25, 2015.
